name: Ludo Champs
description:
LUDO Champs is a dice game by Beyond Infinity Games that you can enjoy. It’s free-to-play and can be enjoyed with friends and family. Relive the nostalgic memories with friends as the fun and addicting ludo gameplay keeps you and your friends entertained. Compete and challenge your friends with your high score or play offline with 3 other players, friends or family. Make those gatherings with friends and family memorable with Ludo Champs.

Ludo is a traditional game of the sub-continent that has deep roots into the people’s day to day life of entertainment and gatherings. Ludo Champs lets you compete online with multiplayer and make your high score or play offline with 3 other friends on a single screen. The colorful board styles combined with the fun and entertaining gameplay keeps the players entertained when they want to kill time or have a good time with friends and family.

Custom Dice and Daily Rewards update coming soon
